name: My Precious Queen! (Skill Card)
text:
Weevil / Skill
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
You can Normal Summon Level 7 Insect monsters for 1 less Tribute.
Once per turn, during the End Phase, you can Special Summon 1 "Insect Monster Token" (Insect/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100).
This Token cannot be Tributed, except for the Tribute Summon of an Insect monster or their effects.
You can Tribute 1 Insect monster from your hand instead, when attacking with "Insect Queen" monsters you control.
